message:
Amazing CQRS + Event Sourcing ( DDD tutorial)
It is not a framework but it will help to understand CQRS + Event Sourcing
name: FAQ
caption: www.cqrs.nu
description: The ideas around CQRS are fascinating, but different enough from the way we do conventional development that some questions come up again and again. This page collect a number of such questions that we've encountered, and attempts to give accurate and satisfactory answers to them.
